page.title: 01OUR AREA
page.content: INTRODUCTION The area covers the south side of Hinckley, a small town in the south west of Leicestershire, and extends across the Roman road of Watling St.(A5) into Warwickshire.The town centre has a pedestrian only shopping street and a twice weekly market. The main industry of the town is hosiery and Knitwear.South of Hinckley is well established council housing which borders two miles out with new private estates of Sketchley and Burbage before the arable and pasture land of Warwickshire. The A5 links with the M69 in the south of our area. The town has a station on the Birmingham to Leicester line.The Ashby Canal, used mainly for pleasure,runs through the area.
